properties.description: The Kasumbalesa border post is located between the DRC and Zambia. It is a unique border crossing and one of the busiest, with commercial vehicles cleared at the border from and to South Africa, Tanzania, Namibia, Mozambique and other SADC countries. It is the main border point for 95% of Congolese mining production.

The Dilolo border post in Lualaba province links the Democratic Republic of Congo and Angola. It is the exit point on the Benguela road, which leads to the port of Lobito. It is part of the Lobito Benguela Corridor.
